price: 24. Moesa zei: “De Heer van de hemelen en de aarde en alles wat daartussen is, indien jullie overtuigd zijn.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
